sect2.title: System.LastIndexOfAny
sect2.para: LastIndexOfAny returns the index of the starting location of the LAST occurrence of the FIRST substring found in AString. If none of the substrings in the AAnyOf list are found in AString, -1 is returned. An empty string in the AAnyOf list will not be found (the empty string is not found in any string).

The substrings are checked in order from first to last only until a match is found. Once a match is found no remaining substrings are checked.
Dataphor indexes are zero based.
IndexOfAny does a case-sensitive comparison.

example.title: Example
